title: Rarity
description: There are times in life that we get to choose our course, and there are times when fate intervenes.  Brogen, an empathic teen, would choose an uneventful junior year, floating by and avoiding all social drama. But fate meddles with her plan and introduces 2 new students that change the course of Brogen's Becca and Jay.Becca, the new hot babe at Stanton,  can flash her smile and instantly scale the social ladder.  Brogen knows Becca is nothing but trouble...she can sense it a mile away and wants no part of it. Jay, the charismatic new guy, is unlike any of their classmates.  He's a chameleon, able to fit in and adapt to any social group.  Brogen is intrigued by Jay. Is he really that friendly or is it a facade?Unfortunately, Brogen is not the only one interested in Jay.  Becca has put him in her crosshairs and is aiming to capture his heart.  Is Brogen intrigued enough about Jay to risk getting in Becca's crosshairs?Rarity isn't your typical teen romance. It's a story of courage, strength, and a deep and unconditional love. The story plunges you into the depths of Brogen and Jay's lives, where you experience events and life changing news that shape and mold them in this pivotal year.  Will these individual challenges push them apart or bind them together?
author: D.A. Roach
